department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Fundamentals of Animation
course.meeting_text: W. 1-5, and weekly film screenings F., 1-3
course.faculty_text: Ruth Stella Lingford (fall term), Paul Bush (spring term)
course.description: An introduction to the possibilities of animation. Using a mixture of traditional and 2D digital tools, students will complete practical exercises which will familiarize them with basic skills and techniques. Screenings and discussions will help develop the specialized thinking needed to understand the discipline.
course.notes: Drawing skills are optional, though helpful. This course has an additional weekly film screening, Fridays, 1-3 pm.
